item.title: Warner Bros favours Netflix offer over $108bn Paramount bid
item.description: Warner Brothers says the offer for its film and streaming businesses is inferior to Netflix's.

item.title: Nato spending pledge is Trump's biggest foreign policy success, Rutte tells BBC
item.description: The Nato chief said it was thanks to Donald Trump that the alliance is "stronger than it ever was".

item.title: Starmer tells Abramovich to 'pay up now' or face court
item.description: The Prime Minister said Roman Abramovich should make good on his pledge that money from the sale of Chelsea FC would go to benefit Ukrainians

item.title: Venezuela denounces Trump's order for ship blockade as 'warmongering threats'
item.description: It comes a week after the US seized an oil tanker off the country's coast, intensifying pressure on Nicol√°s Maduro.

item.title: Nick Reiner charged with murder of his parents Rob and Michele
item.description: Rob Reiner, the Hollywood director, and his wife Michele were both found dead with stab wounds on Sunday.
